name: Darklord of Delight
text: During the Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 Fairy monster face-up. If this card is sent to the GY: You can make all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls lose 500 ATK/DEF for each Fairy monster on the field, until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Darklord of Delight" once per turn.
